author: ETA PRIME
description:
This might be the smallest Steam Machine-style PC I’ve ever built — and it’s running official SteamOS with RDNA3 graphics and an 8-core / 16-thread Ryzen CPU. In this 10-minute build + test, I’m showing the size comparison, the specs, SteamOS settings, and real gameplay at 1080p (and even 1440p in lighter/older titles). Powered by an and risen 7840U and backed by 32GB of Ram this Micro Mini Steam Machine Game!

This is the 3D model I modified: https://makerworld.com/en/models/1994310-valve-steam-machine-1-1-scale-model#profileId-2146544

Follow Me On Twitter: https://twitter.com/theetaprime
Follow Me On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/etaprime/

title: I Built The Worlds Smallest Steam Machine!
